'''Gray Snow Cat''' is a type of cat that can be found in the wild.

==Locations==
Several Gray Snow Cats can be found at [[Asase Shrine]] on [[Seirai Island]], [[Inazuma]].

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=289 Official Interactive Map] for more locations.
